sourcesContent: ðŸŽ“ UNIFOR home Home school Cursos calendar_month Semestres menu_book Disciplinas admin_panel_settings AdministraÃ§Ã£o assignment Matriz Curricular import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { KeycloakService } from 'keycloak-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-layout', templateUrl: './layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./layout.component.scss'], }) export class LayoutComponent implements OnInit { userName: string = ''; roles: string[] = []; // flags de perfil isAdmin = false; isCoordenador = false; isProfessor = false; isAluno = false; constructor(private keycloakService: KeycloakService) {} async ngOnInit() { console.log('ðŸ‘¤ Inicializando layout...'); this.keycloakService.isLoggedIn().then(logged => console.log('ðŸ” EstÃ¡ logado?', logged)); this.keycloakService.loadUserProfile().then(profile => console.log('ðŸ“„ Perfil:', profile)); } async logout() { try { await this.keycloakService.logout(window.location.origin); } catch (error) { console.error('Erro ao sair:', error); } } }
